articles.title: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos plans $5bn share sale - BBC.com
articles.description: In February, Mr Bezos announced that he would sell shares in technology giant worth around $8.5bn.
articles.content:
Amazon founder Jeff Bezos says he will sell another 25 million shares in the technology giant, worth nearly $5bn (£3.9bn).
It comes after the company's stock market value hit a record high on Wednes… [+1373 chars]
